trans-unit.source: Configures the ASP.NET trace service.
trans-unit.target: 設定 ASP.NET 追蹤服務。

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: 這個類別無法被繼承。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Configuration.TraceSection> class provides a way to programmatically access and modify the content of the configuration file `trace` section.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Configuration.TraceSection>類別提供方法來以程式設計方式存取和修改組態檔的內容`trace`> 一節。

trans-unit.source: The trace section configures the ASP.NET trace functionality and controls how trace results are gathered, stored, and displayed.
trans-unit.target: ASP.NET 追蹤功能與控制如何收集、 儲存，並顯示追蹤結果，會設定追蹤 > 一節。

trans-unit.source: When tracing is enabled, each page request generates trace messages that can be appended to the page output or stored in an application trace log.
trans-unit.target: 當啟用追蹤時，每個頁面要求會產生可以附加網頁輸出或儲存在應用程式的追蹤記錄檔中的追蹤訊息。

trans-unit.source: You can use the ASP.NET trace viewer (Trace.axd) to view the contents of the trace log.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用 ASP.NET 追蹤檢視器 (Trace.axd) 來檢視追蹤記錄的內容。

trans-unit.source: The element is allowed in the section of the configuration hierarchy in the Machine.config file and the Web.config files.
trans-unit.target: 在 Machine.config 檔案和 Web.config 檔案中的組態階層 > 一節中允許的項目。

trans-unit.source: It is not allowed in configuration files of Web subdirectories.
trans-unit.target: 不允許在網頁子目錄的組態檔中。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to use the <xref:System.Web.Configuration.TraceSection> type.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Web.Configuration.TraceSection>型別。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.Configuration.TraceSection" /> class using default settings.
trans-unit.target: 使用預設值初始化 <see cref="T:System.Web.Configuration.TraceSection" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the ASP.NET trace service is enabled.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定數值，表示是否要啟用 ASP.NET 追蹤服務。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if trace is enabled; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果追蹤服務已啟動，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to use the <xref:System.Web.Configuration.TraceSection.Enabled%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用 <xref:System.Web.Configuration.TraceSection.Enabled%2A> 屬性。

trans-unit.source: This code example is part of a larger example provided for the <xref:System.Web.Configuration.TraceSection> class.
trans-unit.target: 這個程式碼範例是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分<xref:System.Web.Configuration.TraceSection>類別。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the ASP.NET trace viewer (Trace.axd) is available only to requests from the host Web server.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定數值，表示 ASP.NET 追蹤檢視器 (Trace.axd) 是否只能給主機 Web 伺服器發出的要求使用。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the ASP.NET trace viewer (Trace.axd) is available only to requests from the host Web server; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 ASP.NET 追蹤檢視器 (Trace.axd) 只能給主機 Web 伺服器發出的要求使用，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to use the <xref:System.Web.Configuration.TraceSection.LocalOnly%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用 <xref:System.Web.Configuration.TraceSection.LocalOnly%2A> 屬性。

trans-unit.source: This code example is part of a larger example provided for the <xref:System.Web.Configuration.TraceSection> class.
trans-unit.target: 這個程式碼範例是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分<xref:System.Web.Configuration.TraceSection>類別。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the most recent requests are always stored on the server.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定數值，表示新收到的要求是否一定要存放在伺服器上。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the most recent requests are always stored in the trace log; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果新收到的要求一定是存放在追蹤記錄檔內，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Requests are stored in the trace log in the order they arrive, up to the number of requests specified in the <xref:System.Web.Configuration.TraceSection.RequestLimit%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 要求會儲存在追蹤記錄檔到達時，最多的要求中指定的順序<xref:System.Web.Configuration.TraceSection.RequestLimit%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: When the request limit is reached and <xref:System.Web.Configuration.TraceSection.MostRecent%2A> is `true`, older requests are automatically discarded and new requests continue to be added to the log.
trans-unit.target: 當達到要求限制和<xref:System.Web.Configuration.TraceSection.MostRecent%2A>是`true`、 會自動捨棄較舊的要求和記錄檔中加入新的要求會繼續。

trans-unit.source: When the request limit is reached and <xref:System.Web.Configuration.TraceSection.MostRecent%2A> is `false`, new requests are discarded until earlier requests are removed from the log or the request limit is increased.
trans-unit.target: 當達到要求限制和<xref:System.Web.Configuration.TraceSection.MostRecent%2A>是`false`，新的要求會被捨棄，直到先前的要求會從記錄檔，或要求限制已增加。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to use the <xref:System.Web.Configuration.TraceSection.MostRecent%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用 <xref:System.Web.Configuration.TraceSection.MostRecent%2A> 屬性。

trans-unit.source: This code example is part of a larger example provided for the <xref:System.Web.Configuration.TraceSection> class.
trans-unit.target: 這個程式碼範例是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分<xref:System.Web.Configuration.TraceSection>類別。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the ASP.NET trace information is appended to the output of each page.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定數值，表示 ASP.NET 追蹤資訊是否要附加到每個輸出網頁。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the trace information is appended to each page; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果追蹤資訊會附加到每個網頁，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to use the <xref:System.Web.Configuration.TraceSection.PageOutput%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用 <xref:System.Web.Configuration.TraceSection.PageOutput%2A> 屬性。

trans-unit.source: This code example is part of a larger example provided for the <xref:System.Web.Configuration.TraceSection> class.
trans-unit.target: 這個程式碼範例是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分<xref:System.Web.Configuration.TraceSection>類別。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating the maximum number of requests to the application for which ASP.NET stores trace information.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定數值，表示 ASP.NET 儲存此應用程式的追蹤資訊時，最多可以記錄多少筆要求。

trans-unit.source: The maximum number of requests to store on the server.
trans-unit.target: 存放在伺服器上的要求數量上限。

trans-unit.source: The default is 10.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 10。

trans-unit.source: The maximum request limit is 10,000.
trans-unit.target: 要求上限是 10,000。

trans-unit.source: If a value greater than 10,000 is specified, it is silently rounded down to 10,000 by ASP.NET.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定的值大於 10000，它會以無訊息模式無條件捨去至 10,000 asp.net。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Configuration.TraceSection.MostRecent%2A> property gets or sets a value that determines whether the requests stored on the server are the most recent requests or the first requests to arrive.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Configuration.TraceSection.MostRecent%2A>屬性會取得或設定值，這個值可判斷儲存在伺服器上的要求是否為最新的要求或到達第一個要求。

trans-unit.source: **Note** When the number of requests exceeds the limit imposed by this setting and <xref:System.Web.Configuration.TraceSection.MostRecent%2A> is `false`, no more requests are stored in the trace log.
trans-unit.target: **請注意**當要求數目超過這個設定所加諸的限制和<xref:System.Web.Configuration.TraceSection.MostRecent%2A>是`false`，沒有其他要求會儲存在追蹤記錄檔。

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Web.Configuration.TraceSection.MostRecent%2A> is `true`, the most recent requests are stored up to the limit imposed by this setting and older requests are discarded.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Web.Configuration.TraceSection.MostRecent%2A>是`true`、 最新的要求儲存此設定所加諸的限制，而且會捨棄較舊的要求。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to use the <xref:System.Web.Configuration.TraceSection.RequestLimit%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用 <xref:System.Web.Configuration.TraceSection.RequestLimit%2A> 屬性。

trans-unit.source: This code example is part of a larger example provided for the <xref:System.Web.Configuration.TraceSection> class.
trans-unit.target: 這個程式碼範例是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分<xref:System.Web.Configuration.TraceSection>類別。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the order in which ASP.NET trace information is displayed.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定 ASP.NET 追蹤資訊的顯示順序。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Web.Configuration.TraceDisplayMode" /> values, indicating the order in which trace information is displayed.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個 <see cref="T:System.Web.Configuration.TraceDisplayMode" /> 值，表示追蹤資訊的顯示順序。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to use the <xref:System.Web.Configuration.TraceSection.TraceMode%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用 <xref:System.Web.Configuration.TraceSection.TraceMode%2A> 屬性。

trans-unit.source: This code example is part of a larger example provided for the <xref:System.Web.Configuration.TraceSection> class.
trans-unit.target: 這個程式碼範例是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分<xref:System.Web.Configuration.TraceSection>類別。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the messages emitted through the page trace are forwarded to an instance of the <see cref="T:System.Diagnostics.Trace" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定數值，表示透過網頁追蹤產生的訊息是否要轉送給 <see cref="T:System.Diagnostics.Trace" /> 類別的執行個體。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the trace messages are sent to the <see cref="T:System.Diagnostics.Trace" /> class; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果追蹤訊息會傳送給 <see cref="T:System.Diagnostics.Trace" /> 類別，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to use the <xref:System.Web.Configuration.TraceSection.WriteToDiagnosticsTrace%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用 <xref:System.Web.Configuration.TraceSection.WriteToDiagnosticsTrace%2A> 屬性。

trans-unit.source: This code example is part of a larger example provided for the <xref:System.Web.Configuration.TraceSection> class.
trans-unit.target: 這個程式碼範例是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分<xref:System.Web.Configuration.TraceSection>類別。
